title: Insect Invasion
description:
More people are scared of bugs than they are afraid of becoming the victim of crimes, or even dying. These people suffer from entomophobia, the fear of insects. And when you think about crawlers that are small enough to burrow into the crevices of your skin, winged bugs that can attack from above, and billions of cockroaches that can survive a nuclear apocalypse, maybe we should all be scared to death on an insect invasion.

First, killer growing pains
Followed by, death lurks from above 
Then, art imitates murder
Finally in our featured story, dying from the inside out
